Introductory Class Duration: 10 Lessons Location: Venue: 7A IyaOloye Crescent,idioroko.Maryland Time: 10am-1pm:Saturdays Lessons Concept: Title: creation of original musical works and the study of the techniques and repertoire of composers from seasoned professionals. Students will study, discuss, and create music on their own, in semiprivate and/or private lessons

Einsteins Symphonies History has it that einstein the father of modern day science was an excellent violinist. And it is rumoured he formulated is mind boggling theories when he played his favourite piece
Eureka Modern science have proven that engaging in arts (Music) strengthens right hemisphere of the brain, thus improving intelligence
Serenity We provide a serene environment, that is secure and conducive for learning
Introduction and Orientation The students are taken on a brief tour around the venue, after that they are introduced to the various tutors and personnel present. Each student would be placed in groups of three based on the chosen instrument
History of music This segment comprises of a detailed lecture of the various musical movement and their initiators. They are introduced to the various genre of music and its underlining mechanics
Musical Notation In this segment the students are taught the intricacies of musical notation its workings and importance. They would be taught how to read and write basic musical pieces
Scales and Melodies This segment
Phrase construction content required
Rhythm briefing about rhtymns
Tertian harmony brief about harmony
Non-tertian harmony brief about tertian harmony
Form scholarly
Orchestration The students are required to give two presentations ones based on the classical arts and the other based on African contemporary arts
Services We offer private tutelage, music as a services, musical camps and workshops. We are poised in bringing quality and efficiency to suite your musical needs
